result.execSummary:
The defendant Michelle L. BACKUS was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Deliver Methamphetamine(<=3g), a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(e)1.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Manitowoc County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes:
$395.00 buy money is ordered joint and several with John Her.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Maintain fulltime employment, schooling or a combination of both.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Provide DNA sample and pay the surcharge.

timeConds.notes:
Under the Huber Law.  Court authorizes release for treatment, counseling and child care.

Additional five (5) months jail, under the Huber Law, stayed and to be imposed at the agent's discretion and upon order of the court.

Minutes.
RE:  Deliver Methamphetamine, on 06-30-14.
At 11:49 a.m., search warrant with return of officer thereon.
Affidavit of Detective Adam Sohlden, Manitowoc City Police Department.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of possess Methamphetamine with intent to deliver, deliver imitation controlled substance and deliver Methamphetamine.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 07-21-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $10,000.00 recognizance bond with the condition that she have no contact with John Her.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
